content: in this legal case the court ruled on september 17 2020 that a property is jointly owned by multiple parties as part of an inheritance the court determined that the total value of the property is 29534520 four individuals are entitled to a 14 share each of the property the court ordered the property to be divided and sold separately the legal basis for this ruling is article 720 and article 729 of the civil code the court rejected a counterclaim for exclusive ownership and the demand for reimbursement of expenses the case is remanded for further investigation and a technical expert was ordered to prepare a division project for the properties the properties include apartments storage rooms and land the court determined that the properties are indivisible and ordered their sale the market value of the properties was estimated by a technical expert the courts decision was made on july 17 2020 and filed in the clerks office on september 17 2020
